messages.message:
For the dogfood deprecation tomorrow, we need to mount one of the S3 buckets containing our model dev benchmarking data to another env (ideally aihub-sandbox). @sean.donohoe @jtau do you know how we can do this? cc @Nikolaos Kofinas who can let you know which bucket it is. We also have an ML Studio annotation data repo (https://platform.dogfood.instabase.com/docinsights) that also needs to be remounted to aihub-sandbox.

And @jtau, when you say the envs will be deleted, does that also include the S3 buckets - we should make sure not to delete these.
Yup, Jtau mentioned S3 buckets will not be deleted in his post.
Do you know how we can mount them to aihub-sandbox? Does every engineer have access to do that?

Hrm, I _think_ everyone in eng should have access using the `instabase` AWS account credentials. You need to look up the repo ID from the mount details and mount it with that prefix and use the secret/access key from AWS. If not, might need IT to help here...
